page.title: 13CUSTOMS AND BELIEFS
page.content: { CUSTOMS}are few but here are some: { BONFIRE NIGHT}is celebrated on the 5th of November,fireworks are let off and there is a bonfire too. { APRIL FOOLS}Is celebrated on April 1st(A.M.)people play tricks on others. { EASTER}is celebrated in Spring each year when we remember the crucifiction of Jesus,and are given chocolate eggs. {FIRST FOOTING}is celebrated on 31st of December when someone comes in with a bag of coal and lets the new year in. {CHRISTMAS}is celebrated on December 25th,when we get Christmas presents. {ST.VALENTINES DAY}is celebrated on 14th of Febuary,when you send love notes to the person you love. {TOPPING OFF}ceremonies are carried out by builders when they reach the hightest point in a new structure.They raise a flag and are given beer. {
